zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，谨慎布局]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）在12.152美元附近震荡整理，24小时内小幅下跌0.57%。近期价格在12.2238美元和12.1397美元之间波动，显示出市场情绪相对谨慎。此种走势可能表明短期内缺乏强劲的买入或卖出动力，投资者需密切关注市场变化。

技术指标方面，尽管RSI（相对强弱指数）数据缺失，MACD则显示出负值(-0.0516)，暗示当前市场动能偏弱。20日简单移动平均线（SMA）位于12.25851美元，价格低于该水平，可能表明短期内仍面临一定的下行压力。投资者应留意MACD是否出现金叉信号，以判断后市反弹的可能性。

支撑位方面，12.1397美元是关键支撑区，如果价格跌破该水平，可能引发进一步下跌，目标指向更低的支撑位。而12.2238美元则是近期的阻力位，若突破该水平，可能为市场带来反弹机会。投资者可在支撑位附近考虑低吸，待价格反弹至阻力位时再行止盈。

综合来看，雪崩币当前处于震荡整理阶段，建议投资者采取谨慎态度，关注市场动态和技术指标变化，合理布局。若能在支撑位附近介入，待市场反弹时可获得相应收益。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar stands at 12.152, reflecting a slight decline of 0.57% over the past 24 hours. This movement indicates a bearish sentiment as the price has not been able to maintain upward momentum. The recent high of 12.2238 suggests that selling pressure is present, while the low of 12.1397 could act as a potential support level. Traders should closely monitor these price points to gauge market sentiment and potential reversals.

In terms of technical indicators, the absence of a Relative Strength Index (RSI) complicates the analysis, but the available Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) reading of -0.0516 highlights a bearish divergence. This suggests that the momentum is currently tilted toward selling, which can lead to further downward pressure in the short term. The 20-period Simple Moving Average (SMA) at 12.25851 also reinforces this bearish outlook, as the price remains below this average, indicating a potential resistance level for upward moves.

Support levels around 12.1397 will be critical in the coming sessions. A breach below this price could trigger additional selling, potentially targeting lower levels around 12.00 or even 11.80. Conversely, if AVAX manages to break above the SMA at 12.25851, we may see a resurgence towards previous highs, with resistance likely forming at 12.30 and beyond. 

Traders should adopt a cautious approach, considering both short and long positions. Short-term traders may find opportunities to capitalize on minor retracements, while long-term investors could wait for more favorable entry points near the support level. Setting stop-loss orders below critical support levels is advisable to mitigate risks associated with potential downturns.
